title: Black On White Ep. 08. Flour, Sugar and Tea
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Health and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Death

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Heart - Diseases
abstract: In Australia, the life expectancy for Indigenous men is 59. For non-Indigenous men it is 77. Why?
description: Explores the controversial topic of Australia's Aboriginal community who suffer from higher incidences of heart disease, diabetes and other diet and lifestyle-related health problems compared to non-Indigenous Australians. We share the personal story of John DeSatge, an inspiring Aboriginal man who should not have died so young.
